sources.title: My City Pizza - Documentary (2008)
sources.description: My City Pizza - Documentary Iran/UK / 2008 / 26mins / dir. Ala Mohseni / Farsi with English subtitles Short Synopsis While a wide range of delicious and well known traditional foods are available, pizza is very popular in Tehran. With the advance of this Italian fast food, Tehran√¢s pizzerias have become the battleground between cultural traditions and global tastes. This amusing, fast-paced documentary about eating habits in modern Tehran offers a kaleidoscopic view of the Iranian society. In the film Iranians from all walks of life divulge their identities via their standpoints regarding the pizza in the capital.
